# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSUnderlineStyle] from `Text.LineStyle`.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ lineStyle: Text.LineStyle)
```

## Parameters

- **lineStyle**: A value of `Text.LineStyle` to wrap with [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSUnderlineStyle].

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSUnderlineStyle].

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an underline style with the specified raw value.
